txt.en:
'While returning here from the Rohirrim scout-camp, I thought I saw some strange form of corruption in the wood... like none I have ever seen. Unnatural, it seemed to me.

'Saeradan knows more of this sort of corruption than I. Perhaps we should collect some as we journey back to the scout-camp and bring it to him.

'Will you help?'
'Aye, this should be enough. We should bring this to Saeradan as soon as possible.'
'You have not collected enough of the corrupted materials for Saeradan to examine.'
Andreg is taking you to meet with Saeradan at the Rohirrim scout-camp; however, he needs help with his own mission first.
Collected piles of oozing corruption in the <rgb=#FFFF00>South Gravenwood</rgb> ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Collect piles of oozing corruption in the <rgb=#FFFF00>South Gravenwood</rgb> ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Andreg has asked you to collect leaves and bark covered in the strange corruption so that Saeradan might be able to examine it.
Bring the piles of oozing corruption to Andreg
You should bring the corrupted materials you collected to Andreg.
